name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 025
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, I'm Seeing Dead People, includes a color palette inspired by M. Night Shymalan 6th sense. Color played an incredibly important role in M. Night Shyamalan's The 6th sense. Shyamalan utilized the color red as a symbol of closeness between the real world and spiritual world, using it as a clue to the viewer in regards to the fates of certain characters.  This palette was plucked from a scene in which Haley Joel Osment's character is entering a church with large red doors.  The use of color in this scene was always something that stuck with me.
